import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { DataContext } from '../pages/_app' import Image from './Image' import Section from './Section' import CountBar from './CountBar' const NationalTeam = () => { const { nationalTeam, labels } = useContext(DataContext); return (

{ nationalTeam.copy }

{ nationalTeam.startYear }-{ nationalTeam.endYear }
{ nationalTeam.position } #{ nationalTeam.playerNumber }
) } export default NationalTeam;
